text: Kyle Stephen Ward (born December 15, 1984]) is a former American football cornerback. He was signed by the Green Bay Packers as an undrafted free agent in 2008. He played college football at Louisiana-Lafayette. Ward has also been a member of the Buffalo Bills. ==External links== *Green Bay Packers *Louisiana-Lafayette Ragin' Cajuns bio *Boise State Broncos bio Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Players of American football from Texas Category:American football cornerbacks Category:Louisiana Ragin' Cajuns football players Category:Green Bay Packers players Category:Mahoning Valley Thunder players Category:Buffalo Bills players Category:Texas A&M; Aggies football coaches Category:Boise State Broncos football coaches
title: Kyle Ward (American football)
